threat: An attacker could use these to possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking Firefox.
If a user were tricked into opening a malicious page, an attacker could cause the browser to crash.
If a user were tricked into opening a malicious page, an attacker could cause the browser to crash.
An attacker could exploit this to crash the browser or potentially escalate privileges within the browser.
